name: Codecademy Dark Course
description: Sets a dark theme on the instructions panel of courses. They already use a dark theme in the code editor and console, For some reason the designer(s) over there decided to use a single light panel which is super blinding and distracting while trying to learn. Codecademy devs, take notes. Implement this upstream please.
additional_info:
release 1.0 is working as of 2019-03-16 tested in firefox 65

This is a quick & dirty hacky solution but it works great and accomplishes the goal allowing me to actually focus on learning course content without being overly distracted/irritated by the blinding white background. I couldn't find any other working solutions for this problem at the moment so I had to implement it myself.
